Reviews.Title: No English Manual
Reviews.Author: Vi3tk
Reviews.Content: The OEM Shop: This product came with an Italian manual. My phone had a gap along the right side the thickness of a finger nail.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and UMTS 900/2100 3G frequencies.
5 MP with autofocus; LED flash; Video Camera; FM Radio; A-GPS Navigation; MP3; Touch Screen and Wi-Fi.
MicroSD up to 8GB; Stereo bluetooth; Download/save as support; EDGE class 10; Voice recording; E-Mail support and Instant Messaging SMS/EMS/MMS.
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 260 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: LG GT505 GT505EUBLK Unlocked Mobile Phone with 5 MP Camera, Touch Screen, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi - International Version with No Warranty (White)
